settings.title: Limited Edition Artworks
settings.content: All artworks at The Selects Gallery are produced in strictly limited editions and will never be reproduced, ensuring exclusive provenance and lasting market value.

settings.title: Certificate of Authenticity
settings.content: Every artwork includes a certificate verifying the artist’s authorship and the edition number, guaranteeing authenticity and ownership confidence.

settings.title: Fine Art Quality
settings.content: Our archival prints are created in partnership with leading photography houses under direct artist or estate supervision, using premium papers selected to bring out each image’s best qualities.

settings.title: Secure payment
settings.content: We use industry-standard, encrypted payment processing so your purchase is protected from checkout through delivery.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Sign up to our newsletter to receive exclusive offers.
settings.disclaimer_text: By signing up to our newsletter, you agree with our privacy policy.

settings.title: About
settings.content: Use this text area to tell your customers about your brand and vision. You can change it in the theme editor.
